alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 2:34PM AKST until January 28 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp
